001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.*;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.FeatureMatrices;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
008
009public class ClosedSolutionOptimizer<N extends Number> implements LinearModelOptimizer<N> {
010
011    private boolean debugOutput;
012
013    private final JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport;
014
015    public ClosedSolutionOptimizer(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
016        this.typeSupport = typeSupport;
017    }
018
019    @Override
020    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getCurrentNumberType() {
021        return typeSupport;
022    }
023
024    public boolean isDebugOutput() {
025        return debugOutput;
026    }
027
028    public void setDebugOutput(boolean debugOutput) {
029        this.debugOutput = debugOutput;
030    }
031
032    @Override
033    public void setOptimalWeights(LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> regression, DataSet<N> trainSet) {
034        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = regression.getCurrentNumberType();
035        if (debugOutput) {
036            System.out.println("Number type = " + typeSupport.name());
037        }
038
039        N[] values = typeSupport.createArray(trainSet.size());
040        for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
041            values[i] = trainSet.samples().get(i).targetOutputs()[0];
042        }
043        TypedVector<N> y = Vectors.of(typeSupport, values).transpose();
044        if (debugOutput) {
045            y.print("y");
046        }
047        Matrix<N> designMatrix = FeatureMatrices.create(regression.getFeatureExtractor(), trainSet);
048        if (debugOutput) {
049            designMatrix.print("Φ");
050        }
051
052        Matrix<N> invertedDesignMatrix = designMatrix.pseudoInvert();
053        if (debugOutput) {
054            invertedDesignMatrix.multiply(designMatrix).print("Φ" + Notations.PSEUDO_INVERSE + "Φ = I");
055        }
056
057        Vector<N> weights = invertedDesignMatrix.multiply(y);
058        if (debugOutput) {
059            weights.print("w");
060        }
061
062        for (int i = 0; i < weights.getDimensions(); i++) {
063            regression.setParameter(i, weights.get(i + 1));
064        }
065    }
066
067}
